channel.title: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!
channel.description:
I've sent him several pm's about an issue I had, and would appreciate it if one of you with better contact could help me get him to take care of it.
This is about the Sponsored Servers spot which I've bidded on and bought SEVERAL times.
My account was compromised and I plan to continue to bid for the #1 spot for a long time.
I supplied sufficient proof via PM to him and other information regarding the situation.
I would really appreciate it if this message could get forwarded to him.
Thank you!

item.title: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!
item.dc:creator: @mattsforeal mattsforeal
item.description:
@mattsforeal wrote:

I’ve contacted Tom who can hopefully resolve this for me.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!

item.title: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

If you forward me a PM about what exactly your problem is with any appropriate evidence/information, I’ll see if I can do anything. I currently handle sponsored applications, and usually deal with any problems but there is still some stuff I can’t deal with. If I can’t handle it, I’ll be sure to pass it on to MITB.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!

item.title: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:7, topic:514088”]Correct me if I am wrong [Ruby], since I never go there, but doesnt the server list use your forum account? If so, than any admin should be able to help him recover the account.

Give a pm to these guys also
tom http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=284102
taharok http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=28549[/quote]
I was sure that only Moparisthebest could edit who could and couldn’t use the status page due to the fact that all the payments for it go through him, if someone never paid him and him alone could move the user into a certain group and remove that user, I may be wrong there. It’s worth sending a PM to Tom or Taharok though.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!

item.title: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!

item.description:

Correct me if I am wrong [Ruby], since I never go there, but doesnt the server list use your forum account? If so, than any admin should be able to help him recover the account.

Give a pm to these guys also
tom http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=284102

item.title: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

The only person who has access to the status page and all of the tricks that come with it is Moparisthebest (I think). I’ve forwarded this link to him in the staff IRC channel and he’ll hopefully reply or PM you next time he’s online which at the latest will be Sunday.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!

IRC Chat not working for me…

item.title: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If you wish you can hit the IRC Chat button and see if you can get help from either Tom, Taharok or if MITB is on you may be able to get his help.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!

item.title: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!
item.dc:creator: @mattsforeal mattsforeal
item.description:
@mattsforeal wrote:

I’ve pmed moparisthebest on the account I lost a while back when the automated system for the sponsorship list failed to work. He replied promptly then, but either way this is a pretty important issue for me when i have over 36k votes already, I shouldn’t have to make a new account to bid with…

I’m not too all that familiar with this community so like I said, if you are able to talk to one of these guys, please refer this to them.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!

item.title: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Taharok is the most helpful out of everyone, whether he is admin still or even active I don’t know. But whenever I messaged him I would get a response all the time. Also Tom, I’m sure since he is a new admin he would be glad to listen.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to talk to Moparisthebest! Important!
